Ludmila is a very enthusiastic and happy person. She enjoys being in sales and dreams of opening a small shop in her town. Ludmila would like to borrow 12,000 Grivnas to purchase seasonal inventories.

loans.use: To purchase seasonal inventories

loans.name: Huey

texts.en:
The concept of Huey K.’s business is to buy broken electronics and restore them for resale. After being laid off, Huey used his background in electronics to create the concept for Yard Sale Electronics in 2007. He started the business in 2008. The idea of owning his own business interested Huey, and he decided to “take the plunge.” He thinks making a profit in a self-owned business is a powerful concept. In the future, he would like to expand his business into buying and selling other forms of electronics.

Huey’s loan from ACCION Texas-Louisiana really helped his business. It gave him the capital to go back to school to take a couple of classes. The loan also helps him pay for a storage facility. He needs the storage space to keep the broken products that he buys before he takes them to his apartment to fix them. Once he has created a working product, he uses Ebay and Craig’s List to sell his electronics.

The concept of microbusiness was something that Huey found compelling. He read about microfinancing for the first time in a newspaper article and was doing more research on his own when he came upon information about ACCION. He believes that microlending is a “winning idea” and that the concept is going to catch on even more than it already has.  

Huey describes himself as a true entrepreneur. He loves taking risks and took the risk to start his own business involving something he knows well – electronics. His advice to new business owners is to not be afraid of failing. He thinks people have to be brave to start their own business, but if they can get over their fear, it is worth it.

Check out his website at http://www.yardsaleelectronics.com.

loans.use: To pay for a storage facility

loans.name: Luis Camilo

texts.es:
Luis de 35 años, (aparece con su familia (-) el menor ) es un hombre emprendedor pero por cosas del destino lo sacaron del trabajo dándole una liquidación que le ayudo a buscar una actividad económica. 

Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Fortín pudo ubicar una tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Ya tiene 8 años con su tienda en donde vende víveres de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar la libra a $ 0.25, aceite a $ 1.20 etc. Con la ayuda de su esposa ha podido surtir más la tienda con vegetales y verduras. Ellos quieren seguir trabajando para darle un buen futuro a sus tres hijos de 9, 7, y 3 años (aparecen los mayores en la foto). 

Tiene muchas aspiración con su tienda por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vitrinas, arroz, azúcar y así poderla surtir mas. En el futuro quiere construir mejor su casa ubicando una losa y que sus hijos terminen los estudios con éxito.
texts.en:
35 year-old Luis (who appears in this photo with his family, minus his youngest) is an enterprising man.  Fate meant that he lost his job and was given severance pay which helped him to look for a business activity.

Luis lives in a peri-urban area called Fortín where he set up a store in the front of his home.  He has had his store for 8 years now.  He sells essential household products such as rice, sugar at $0.25 a pound, oil at $1.20, etc.  With his wife's help, he has been able to better stock his store with vegetables and greens.  They would like to continue working to provide a good future for their three children aged 9, 7 and 3 (the eldest two appear in the photo).

Luis has a lot of aspirations for his store.  He would like a loan so that he can buy display cases, rice, sugar and thereby better stock the store.  In the future, he would like to better build his house, installing a tile floor, and he would like his children to finish their studies successfully.

loans.use: To buy display cases and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more products

loans.name: Pena Alta En Desarrollo 1, 2, 3 Group

texts.en:
Luz is the coordinator of her group Pena Alta en Desarrollo (High Rock in Development) 1, 2, 3.   Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area where crime is rampant and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. 

Luz is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing clothes, shoes and calling cards. She operates a miscellaneous store. She will use the profits to buy some calves to raise and sell. She wants to have a big home for her whole family. She thanks you all for your support. 

One of the people in the picture is not an active member active of the group, but was the founder (the one wearing white clothes at the right)

loans.use: To buy shoes, clothes and calling cards

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es: Sandra Maria tiene 44 años, su actividad es la venta de productos varios. Hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que inicio como un medio de vida muy importante ella tiene 1 hijo de 21 años que le ayuda en este tipo de negocio ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable con sus créditos, esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos por lo que se siente muy contenta con esta actividad.  El motivo de este crédito es para la compra de frutas, bolsas, pajillas, hielo, azúcar granos básicos entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Sandra Maria is 44 and she sells different products.  She started with this business more than 8 years ago as a vital part of her financial support.  She has a son who is 21 and who helps her with the business.  She has shown herself to be a very responsible person with her loans.  This is not the first time she has had financing and she feels very satisfied with this type of assistance.  Sandra Maria will use this loan to buy fruit, bags, straws, ice, sugar, basic grains, etc.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Cristo La Fuente 1, 2,  3 Group

texts.en:
Graciela is the coordinator of her group Cristo la Fuente 1, 2, 3 (Christ the Source). She makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their 4 children. She says that her most difficult challenge is saving enough money to buy a house and to return to Haiti. In the meantime she plans to continue to enjoy attending the church.

Graciela is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for 7 years, which was started with a loan from a family living here before her in the Dominican Republic. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying shoes, clothes and cosmetics products to sell. She will save the profits, because through this business she wants to make her dreams come true – to have her own house and to move back to Haiti.

Graciela's association with Esperanza began because she wants to improve her business and learn more about how to run a business. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural area surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and irregular electricity.

loans.use: To buy shoes, clothes and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Joiel

texts.es: Joel, de 22 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador; que vive junto a su mamá Elizabeth de 43 años, su papá Clemente de 45 años, y su hermano Paúl de 12 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. Esté responsable joven, hace 5 años que se dedica a la agricultura ayudando a salir adelante a su madre. Sus principales cultivos constan de papa, arveja y hortalizas, los cuales siembra a gran escala, ya que sus padres heredaron muchos terrenos agrícolas. Lo que más le gusta a Joel, es poder esparcir la semilla de su producción, ya que según menciona, “es símbolo de un nuevo objetivo”. En cada cosecha, Joel, viaja al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Pero como joven ambicioso, el desea más adelante abrir una empresa de ganadería, donde pueda criar y comercializar la carne de los animales más comercializados. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, y como socio nuevo de su banco comunal; está orgulloso del progreso obtenido hasta hoy. Con el monto que solicita comprará varios sacos de abono y fertilizantes orgánicos; los cuales esparcirá en sus diferentes sembríos.
texts.en:
22 year-old Joel is a single and hard-working man who lives together with his mom, 43 year-old Elizabeth, his dad, 45 year-old Clemente, and his brother, 12 year-old Paúl.  They live together in their own home which is located in the town of Ricrican.  This responsible young man has been farming for 5 years, helping his mother to get ahead in life.  His main crops are potatoes, peas and vegetables which he grows on a large scale since his parents inherited a lot of farmland.  What Joel likes most is sowing his land with seed since he says "it is the symbol of a new goal".

With every harvest, Joel travels to the wholesale market in the city of Tarma.  However, as an ambitious young man, further down the line he would like to open a livestock business where he can raise and sell the meat of animals which make most sales.  This is his first loan with MFP and, as a new member of his community bank, he is proud of the progress he has made up to this point.  He will use his loan money to buy several sacks of manure and organic fertilizer which he will spread on his different crops.

loans.use: To buy several sacks of manure and organic fertilizer

loans.name: Blanca Isabel

texts.es:
Blanca de 27 años, tiene un puesto de venta de pollos en la vereda de una calle. Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo es conocida porque vende pollos lista para preparar y comer. 

El puesto de venta de pollos es un negocio familiar que ya ha venido desarrollándose hace 35 años por su mama y ella para seguir la tradición continua con el negocio. Trabaja con ayuda de su mama desde las 06h00am hasta las 14h00pm ya que ella está estudiando en la universidad. Cada pollo lo vende según sea el peso peo el promedio de vender un pollo entero es de $ 6.50.

Para seguir con su negocio familiar ella quiere comprar con el préstamo pollos para poderlos vender en su puesto. En el futuro quiere continuar con su negocio y uno de sus objetivos tener un cyber como un nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
27 year-old Blanca has a stall on a street sidewalk where she sells chickens.  She lives in an urban area called Guasmo.  Blanca is well known because she sells chickens that are ready to prepare and eat.

Blanca's chicken stall is a family business which has been in existence for 35 years.  Her mother used to own the business and she is following family tradition by continuing the business.  Blanca works, with her mom's help, from 6.00am to 2.00pm since she is studying at university.  She sells every chicken according to its weight but the average price she sells a whole chicken for is $6.50.

To continue with her family business, she would like to use her loan to buy chickens to sell on her stall.  In the future, she would like to continue with her business and one of her goals is to own an Internet cafe as a new business.

loans.use: To buy chickens

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es:
José María, es un señor de 47 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, posee una venta de bebidas refrescantes, vive con su esposa Dora Elizabeth y tienen  dos hijos de 25 y 18 años quienes son independientes.
Don José María vende agua, jugos, gaseosas, gatorade y los distribuye en tiendas de los alrededores, él por el momento tiene problemas con su vehículo y debe llevarlo al mecánico ya su problema lo presenta en el motor, por lo que solicita un préstamo para salir de esta situación que le atrasa el envió de mercadería para los demás negocios, ya que a través de su vehículo logra distribuir la bebida, este préstamo le ayudara a tener el carro en buenas condiciones. 
Su objetivo en que a través del negocio pueda tener mejores condiciones con su esposa y estabilizar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
José María is 47 years old and lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department.  He has a business selling soft drinks and lives with his wife, Dora Elizabeth.  He has two children aged 25 and 18 who are no longer dependent on him. 

José María sells water, juice, soda and Gatorade.  He delivers the drinks to stores in surrounding areas.  Right now he has problems with his vehicle and he needs to take it to a mechanic since it has an engine problem.  He is requesting a loan to get himself out of this situation because he uses his vehicle to deliver his drinks and his problems with his vehicle are slowing him down in delivering his merchandise to other businesses.  This loan will allow him to have a vehicle that is in good condition.

José María's goal is, through his business, to achieve better living conditions for himself and his wife and to stabilize his income.

loans.use: To repair his vehicle's engine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Merchandise such as foodstuff, cold cuts, dairy products, candies

loans.name: Maria Tomasa

texts.es:
María tiene 51 años de edad, es una señora trabajadora se dedica a una panadería y a la crianza de cerdos, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su esposo don José Francisco con quien procrearon 6 hijos de los cuales solo cuatro viven con ellos ya que los otros dos están casados, sus hijos se llaman Nelson Antonio de 20 años, Digna de 18, Melvin Leonel de 12 años de edad. Tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la crianza de cerditos y hace 5 años aprendió a preparar pan dulce a través de capacitaciones que recibió, lo que le ha permitido dedicarse a dos negocios para generar ganancias para su familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar insumos para la panadería como harina, levadura y azúcar, también comprara 2 cerditos para engordarlos, este préstamo le ayudara para realizar la inversión al negocio y podrá hacer pan para vender, al igual que los cerditos los engordara para luego comercializarlos.
Su misión es seguir creciendo y mejorando su producción de la panadería y aumentar el número de cerditos en su granja para ir desarrollándose en el comercio y generar ganancias para cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old.  She is a hard-working lady who runs a bakery and raises pigs.  She lives in Corinto, in Morazán department, with her husband José Francisco, with whom she has six children.  Only four of their children still live with them as the other two are married.  Their children are 20 year-old Nelson Antonio, 18 year-old Digna and 12 year-old Melvin Leonel.

María has been raising pigs for 20 years and 5 years ago she learned to make 'pan dulce' (lightly-sweetened bread) through some training that she received.  This allowed her to carry out two businesses to make money for her family.

María is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her bakery such as flour, yeast and sugar.  She will also buy two piglets to fatten.  This loan will help her to invest in her business.  She will be able to make bread to sell and she will be able to fatten her piglets and then sell them.

María's mission is to continue growing and improving her production in her bakery and to increase the number of piglets on her farm so that she can make progress in the business and make profits to cover her family's expenses.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her bakery such as flour and sugar and to buy pigs

loans.name: Stephanie

texts.es:
Doña Stephanie A. A., tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, llego a completar sus estudios pero por necesidad no pudo continuar con la universidad
Es el primer crédito que solicita en la Fundación Mujer, ella se dio cuenta de la Fundación por medio una de una clienta.
Ella con el préstamo va a invertirlo en la compra de mercadería: ropa de niño, niña y adultos, Bolsos,  bisutería  ya que diciembre es una época muy buena.
Stephanie tiene más de tres años de vender, empezó con un monto de 30,000.00 colones los cuales fueron ahorros de ella, la clienta se dedico a vender  para tener su propio ingreso y  ayudar a los gastos de la casa 
La solicitante se levanta temprano y hace las labores domesticas, y cuida a sus dos hijos pequeños, durante la tarde se dedica a vender y cobrar 
Una meta de la señora es terminar sus estudios, tener casa propia, y llegar a tener una tienda
Con el préstamo la señora podrá tener más capital de trabajo para seguir  creciendo
texts.en:
Stephanie A. A., 25 years old, lives with her husband and her two children.  She completed her studies, but due to need could not continue on to college.

This is the first loan she is applying for at Fundación Mujer.  She found out about the Fundación through a customer.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise: clothing for children and adults, bags, and costume jewelry, since December is a good time for her business.

Stephanie has been selling for more than three years.  She began with 30,000.00 colones, which were her savings.  She began selling in order to earn her own money and to help with household expenses.

She rises early, does household chores, and cares for her two small children.  During the afternoon, she sells and collects money.  Her goals are to finish her studies, have her own house, and have a store.  With the loan, she will be able to have more capital for her business in order to keep growing.

loans.use: To invest in merchandise: bags, clothing for children and adults, costume jewelry, etc

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es:
Don Cristino es un agricultor se dedica a la siembra de Hortalizas, tiene 54 años de edad, vive con su esposa Maritza, tienen una hija de 4 años de edad llamada Estefani, la historia de don Cristino en la agricultura es que él la inicio después de recibir asistencia técnica por agrónomos quienes le enseñaban  el proceso de la siembra, él trabaja todos los días desde muy temprano y hasta en las noches ya que las hortalizas requieren de mucho cuidado.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la siembra de más Hortalizas y la producción de dulce de panela que es un proceso de molienda de caña de azúcar, este préstamo le será útil ya que los préstamo son una herramienta de trabajo para la producción y comercialización de los productos agropecuarios que les permite crecer y desarrollarse aunque los riesgos en las hortalizas son varios pues son delicadas y puede llegarles la plaga y dañar todos los frutos.
Su Objetivo es seguir trabajando en la siembra de hortalizas ya que una buena siembra obtiene buena producción la cual es muy rentable y genera de ella los ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos y mejora su condición de vida velando siempre por su salud, alimentación y educación.
texts.en:
Don Cristino is a vegetable farmer. He is 54 years old and lives with his wife Maritza. They have a four year old daughter named Estafani. Don Cristino’s history as a farmer started when he received technical assistance from agronomists who taught him the process of planting. He works every day from the early morning hours until nighttime because the vegetables require much attention.

He is currently requesting a loan to invest in planting more vegetables and producing brown sugar, which involves processing and milling sugar cane. This loan will help him acquire the equipment he needs to produce and sell his agricultural products so that he can grow and develop. Growing vegetables has risks since they are delicate and can be infested with disease that could damage all the fruit.

His goal is to continue working and planting vegetables so that he can obtain good production that is profitable and will generate income to help his children. With this he hopes to improve their living conditions so that they will always be healthy, well-fed, and educated.

loans.use: Invest in growing vegetables and producing brown sugar

loans.name: Nilton

texts.es: Nilton, de 30 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive junto a su mamá, Artemia, de 58 años de edad, a la que cuida y protege en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. La siembra de papa, olluco y oca (tubérculos), es su principal actividad económica; pero como buen hijo del campo, Nilton menciona que siembra “de todo”, entre hortalizas y cebada, la forma de trabajo de esté emprendedor hombre es en épocas agrícolas, las cuales se determinan de acuerdo a las temporadas de lluvia y sequía. Durante los 20 años que tiene dedicándose a la agricultura, aprendió no solo las técnicas de cultivo, también a comercializar sus productos, que son vendidos en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde aplica en cada momento las enseñanzas de, “mejorar sus ventas”, que le otorga su banco comunal. Por ello ahora, él desea adquirir una casa en la ciudad para poder tener un lugar donde quedarse en épocas de campaña agrícola.  Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y como hombre responsable, él se siente reconfortado por pertenecer a su banco comunal, bueno y responsable. Con el monto que solicita comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, que esparcirá entre sus sembríos, y si el dinero le alcanza podrá invertir en la limpieza de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Nilton, age 30, is a single hardworking gentleman. He lives with his mother Artemia, age 58, and cares for and protects her in his own home in the town of Ricrican. He grows tubers such as potatoes, ulluco, and oca as his main business activity. Being a “good son of the field”, Nilton says he can grow everything from vegetables to wheat. This man keeps himself busy with his farming whether it is the rainy or dry season. During the twenty years he has been farming, Nilton has learned farming techniques and how to sell his products at wholesale market in the city of Tarma. Every opportunity he applies what he learned from his Communal Bank to increase his sales. For now he wants to acquire a house in the city so that he will have a place to stay during the farming season.

This is his fourth loan with MFP. Being a responsible man, Nilton feels comfortable that his Communal Bank is also good and responsible. With the amount requested, he will purchase several sacks of organic fertilizer to apply on his crops and use any money left over to invest in clearing his farmland.

loans.use: Purchase organic fertilizer & clear his fields

loans.name: Bendicion De Mujeres Trabajadoras 1, 2 Group

texts.en:
Reyna is the coordinator of her group Bendicion de mujeres trabajadoras (Blessing of working women) 1, 2 .   Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally,  many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti. Her group is located in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries.  The main economic activity here is the Free trading zone, a cement factory, and others.  This is an area where crime is rampant and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. Reyna makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their two children.

Reyna is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza.  She has a food stand where she sells sandwiches, hot dogs, burgers and juices.  She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing meat, bread, juices, vegetables, sausages, etc. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business to make it grow. Her long-term goal is to save enough money to expand and improve her business. She wants to be a successful businesswoman and attend the university. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy meat, bread, juices, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase a two piglets & a metal silo for storing corn

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, de 40 años de edad, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive en compañía de su hermana, Elisa, de 48 años y su mamita Lucia, de 86 años de edad; en la localidad de Ricrican. La siembra de tubérculos en su variedad de papa, olluco, así como de habas, son los cultivos de Juan, los que hace 20 años, viene sembrando con esmero y ahínco. Pues según menciona, es uno de los mejores agricultores de la zona. El secreto de Juan, es la tenacidad, responsabilidad y dedicación; que le brinda a sus sembríos, por ello, en cada cosecha los mismos intermediarios, visitan sus terrenos agrícolas para comprar sus cultivos íntegros. Ahora esté exitoso hombre desea incursionar en la costura, abriendo un taller en su casa, donde podrá brindar el servicio de confección y refacción de prendas de vestir. Este es el  sexto crédito con MFP, y agradece el apoyo constante que recibe de su banco comunal, lo que le motiva a salir adelante cada día. Con el monto que solicita comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá en sus diferentes sembríos, que dentro de algunos meses cosechará.
texts.en: Juan, 40 years old, is a single and hard working man.  He lives with his sister Elisa, 48 years old, and his mother Lucia, 86 years old, in the area of  Ricrican.  He grows various tubers such as potatoes, ollucos ( a type of root vegetable), as well as beans.  He has been growing these with care and diligence for the last 20 years.  He is, by his own admission, one of the best farmers in the area.  Juan's secret is tenacity, responsibility and dedication that he brings to his crops and therefore the same intermediaries come to his farm at each harvest time to purchase his products. At this time, this successful man wants to embark in the tailor business by opening a shop in his home from where he will be able to provide the service of tailoring and alteration of clothing.  This is his sixth loan with MFP and he is thankful for the constant support that he receives from his community bank, which motivates him to get ahead every day.  With the money that he will receive, he will purchase several bags of organic fertilizer, to be spread on his various crops which he will harvest in several months.

loans.use: Purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Mirna Cristabel

texts.es:
Mirna, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, tiene 22 años y vive con sus dos hijos Luis Enrique de 6 años y Yesica de 4 años de edad, ella es madre soltera y se dedica a la venta de ropa como su fuente principal de ingreso para llevar a su hogar el alimento para sus hijos. El negocio tiene un año de administrarlo y su madre fue su principal apoyo para iniciarlo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa ya que en esta temporada ella prevé un aumento en sus ventas por lo que quiere prepararse surtiendo el negocio con prendas de vestir de moda, este préstamo la ayudara a disponer de mercadería y ofrecer a los clientes.
Con el apoyo del préstamo ella espera crecer su micro negocio y así fortalecer sus ingresos para darles a sus hijos la alimentación, salud y educación necesaria.
texts.en:
Mirna lives in the Corinto department of Morazán.  She is 22 years old, and she lives with her two children.  Luis Enrique is six years old, and Yesica is four years old.  She is a single mother.

She sells clothes as her primary source of income for feeding her children.  She has been running her business for one year.  Her mother was her primary support for starting the business.

She is requesting a loan to buy clothes.  She foresees an increase in sales this season, and she wants to be prepared by stocking her business with fashionable clothes.  This loan will help her to have merchandise to sell to the customers.

With the support from the loan she hopes to grow her small business.  That way she will strengthen her income in order to give her children food, health, and the necessary education.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Ramón Antonio

texts.es: El señor Ramón Antonio H. H., tiene la edad de 38 años, vive en el populoso Barrio de Laureles Norte, es casado y su esposa se dedica a realizar los trabajos del hogar, ellos tienen 2 hijos adolecentes que se dedican a  los estudios secundarios, trabaja como guarda de seguridad  desde hace 15 años, son una familia de limitados recursos económicos que habitan en una humilde vivienda, ya que desean realizar unas remodelaciones en el frente de su hogar que solicita un préstamo con el fin de  arreglarla para este periodo navideño, esta inversión le permitirá la tranquilidad de ofrecerle a  los suyos mejores comodidades para su familia.
texts.en: Ramón Antonio H. H. is 38 years old and lives in the crowded neighborhood of Laureles Norte.  He is married and his wife takes care of the household chores.  They have 2 teenagers who are in high school.  Ramốn has been working as a security guard for 15 years and they are a family of few economic means who live in a modest home.  They would like to do some work to the front of their home and are requesting a loan so that they can do this work for the Christmas period.  This investment will enable Ramón to offer his family a more comfortable life.

loans.use: To build out the front of their home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es: El señor Mario Antonio M. A., tiene la edad de 38 años es casado y su esposa se dedica a comercializar frutas y verduras, ellos tienen 2 hijos uno adolecente y el otro menor de edad, que se dedican a estudiar la primaria y secundaria respectivamente, el es agricultor con una experiencia de más de 15 años, años en los cuales la infección de plagas de insectos le disminuyen sus cosechas y le ocasionan problemas económicos, es para sus terrenos que solicita un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y fungicidas, que le permitan un Mantenimiento Fito Sanitario, en beneficio a corto plazo de las cosechas y sus niveles de ventas que favorezcan su economía para la mejora continua de sus niveles de vida.
texts.en: Mario Antonio M. A. is 38 years old.  He is married and his wife sells fruit and vegetables.  They have 2 children, one teenager who is in hgih school and another who is in elementary school.  Mario Antonio is a farmer with more than 15 years of experience.  Over the years, insect infestations have reduced his harvests and caused him financial problems.  He is requesting this loan for his land, so that he can buy fertilizers and fungicides that will allow him to maintain plant health.  This will benefit both his crops and his sales levels over the short term which, in turn, will be beneficial to him financially and allow him to continue improving his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To maintain plant health

loans.name: Willian Alexander

texts.es:
William, se dedica a la venta de minutas y de tortillas, tiene 33 años de edad y vive con su esposa quien se dedica a la preparación de tortillas para vender, residen en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, Don William tiene 4 años de dedicarse al negocio de minutas las vende en un carruaje móvil todos los días de la semana por las calles de El Transito, su esposa tiene el puesto de venta en El mercado municipal de esta misma ciudad.
Él solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, comprando jaleas, miel, hielo y depósitos para la preparación y venta de las minutas, con esta ayuda realizara una buena inversión para mejorar la calidad de servicio a los clientes y satisfacer sus gustos.
La aspiración de William es fortalecer el negocio y aumentar las ventas para recibir mejores ingresos que le permitan cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
William sells snacks and tortillas.  He is 33 years old, and he lives with his wife.  She makes tortillas to sell.  They live in El Transito in the San Miguel department.

William has had his snack business for four years.  He sells every day of the week from a mobile cart on the streets in El Transito.  His wife has a stall that she sells from in the municipal market in the same city.

He is requesting the loan to invest in his business by purchasing jelly, honey, ice, and food containers to prepare and sell the snacks.  With this help he will make a good investment in order to improve the quality of customer service.  He will also satisfy his customers’ tastes.

Williams’ aspiration is to strengthen the business and to increase sales.  He wants to do this to get better income, which will allow him to cover the necessities.

loans.use: To buy jelly, honey, ice, and food containers to prepare and sell  snacks

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 28 años, es un padre soltero y trabajador; que vive junto a su hijo, Roy, de 4 años de edad, al que cría y educa en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. El trabajo al que se dedica esté valiente hombre es la agricultura, hace tan solo 5 años que comenzó a comercializar sus sembríos de tubérculos en la variedad de, papa, olluco y oca. Lo que más le gusta a Luis es pasar la mayor parte del día en sus sembríos, pues según afirma, “ya está acostumbrado a esa rutina”. Mientras que cuida de sus cultivos, Luis, aprovecha el tiempo para criar las cabezas de ganado ovino que tienen hace algunos años; los cuales junto a su cosecha los comercializa en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Pero él, aún tiene muchas visiones, una de ellas es comprar un carro, para poder dedicarse al trasporte público, asimismo abrir una tienda de comestibles, ya que en su localidad no hay una. Este es el  tercer crédito con MFP, y como socio nuevo de su banco comunal, se encuentra agradecido por el apoyo que le brindaron al aceptar su integración. Con el monto que solicita comprará, varios sacos de abono orgánico, los cuales esparcirá en sus sembríos de las diferentes variedades de tubérculos.
texts.en: Luis, age 28, is a single father and a hard-worker. He lives with his four year old son, Roy. He cares for and raises his son in his own house, which is in Ricrican. This brave man is a farmer. He started selling his tuber crops; potatoes, olluco, and oca only five years ago. What Luis likes the best is spending the greatest part of the day with his crops. He says, “I am now accustomed to this routine”. Luis takes advantage of the time that he takes care of his crops to take care of the cattle that he has had for some years. He sells the cattle and his harvest in the central market of the city of Tarma. He also has a lot of visions. One of them is to buy a car in order to be able to work in public transportation. At the same time he wants to open a food store because there is not one in his area. This is his third loan with MFP. As a new member of his communal bank he is grateful for the support they offer him by accepting him as a member. He will use the loan to buy various sacks of organic fertilizer. He will spread the fertilizer on the different varieties of tubers that he grows.

loans.use: To buy organic sacks of fertlizer

loans.name: Susana

texts.es: La señora Susana, se dedica a la venta de celulares y accesorios para teléfonos móviles en un puesto en alquiler, ella indica que es su única forma de sustento para ayudar a sus Papas que ya son de edad avanzada, la semana anterior ella pasó unos cursos de decodificación e indica que el crédito que se le otorgara es para la compra de cajas para decodificación y de esta forma generar mayores ingresos para su familia por la creciente demanda que existe en la compra de teléfonos celulares, es una joven trabajadora y responsable que a su corta edad ya asume con los gastos de la casa, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Susana sells cell phones and accessories for mobile phones in a stand that she rents.  This is her only form of support to help her elderly parents.

Last week she passed some unlocking courses, and she will use the loan in order to buy the boxes to unlock phones.  This way she will generate more income for her family because there is a growing demand to buy cell phones.

She is a hard-working and responsible young woman.  At her young age she already assumes the household expenses.  She is very grateful to the institution for the help that has been offered.

loans.use: To buy cell phones and accessories

loans.name: Flor Alejandrina

texts.es:
Flor de 38 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre, ella es soltera y se dedica a la administración de una tienda, dicho negocio fue fundado por su madre y se lo heredo, lo atiende todos los días de la semana de 5:00am a 8:00pm, su ventaja es que el lugar no hay otro negocio cerca lo que le permite vender su mercadería.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pollo, pan, aceite, entre otros productos que son demandados por los clientes, con esta ayuda incrementara el inventario y tendrá la oportunidad de crecer en su ventas.
Su principal objetivo es mantener el negocio estable para contar con una fuente de ingreso permanente y cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Flor is 38 years old and resides in San Miguel, Department of San Miguel. She lives with her mother. Flor is single and manages a store. She says her mother started this business and then she inherited it from her. Flor manages the store every day of the week from 5am to 8pm. The advantage she has in this place is that there are no other businesses nearby, so she is able to sell her merchandise.

Flor is requesting a loan to buy chicken, bread, oil, and other products that are demanded by her customers. With this help, she will be able to increase her inventory and have the opportunity to grow her sales.

Her main objective is to maintain a stable business so that she will have a steady source of income to cover her needs.

loans.use: Purchase chicken, bread, oil, and other products

loans.name: Damiana

texts.es: Damiana, de 39 años, es una valerosa madre soltera de 2 hijos: Analis, de 4 y Elvis, de 18 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos vive en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. El trabajo que desarrolla junto a su familia e hijas, es el sembrío de tubérculos como papa, olluco y oca, los cuales vende en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Pero ella, no pierde el tiempo pues según afirma, mientras que los fertiliza y limpia de sus cultivos, también se  dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cerdos, gallinas y cuyes, los que gracias a su buen cuidado y alimentación; comercializa su carne, a los pobladores de Ricrican. Damiana, ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a la agricultura, y ahora ella desea mejorar la calidad de sus cultivos, y sobre todo a minimizar gastos con nuevas técnicas de cultivo. Este es el  cuarto crédito con MFP, y como socia nueva de su banco comunal, agradece el apoyo que recibió al integrarse. Con el monto que solicita comprará, varios sacos de abono orgánico, los que esparcirá en sus diferentes sembríos.
texts.en:
Damiana, age 39, is a courageous single mother of two children: Analis (age 4) and Elvis (age 18). This family lives in their own home located in the town of Ricrican. Damiana works with her family growing tubers such as potatoes, ulluco, and oca. These crops are sold at the central market in the city of Tarma. Damiana says she does not waste time since she must fertilize and clean her crops. In addition, she raises small animals such as pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs. By taking care of and feeding the animals, she is able to sell the meat to the residents of Ricrican. Damiana has been farming for twenty years and now wants to improve the quality of her crops and minimize her costs with new agricultural techniques.

This is her fourth loan with MFP. As a member of her Communal Bank, Damiana is grateful for the support she has received since joining. With the amount she requested, she will buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to apply on her various crops.

loans.use: Purchase sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Luz Melida

texts.es:
Luz de 53 años, es una mujer trabajadora que siempre le ha gustado tener su propio dinero para poder mantener a sus dos hijos ya que está separada de su esposo. 

Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso ha trabajado en su casa vendiendo ropa a sus vecinos y conocidos. Tiene horarios variados desde las 09h00am hasta las 17h00pm. Vende ropa de hombre y mujeres para poder mantener a los gastos de la casa. Ella tiene muchas proyecciones por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar ropa y dedicar otra parte para construcción de su casa con cemento y pinturas. 

Uno de sus objetivos y metas para el futuro es terminar de construir su casa y así asegurar su vejez.
texts.en:
Luz , age 53, is a hardworking woman who always likes having her own money in order to support her two children. She is separated from her husband.

Luz lives in a periurban area called Paraíso where she works from home selling clothing to her neighbors and acquaintances. Her schedule varies between the hours of 9am and 5pm. She sells men’s and women’s clothing to cover the household expenses. Luz has many projects and wants the loan to buy clothing and set aside part of it to build her house with cement and paints.

One of her goals and objectives for the future is to finish the construction of her house and secure her retirement.

loans.use: Purchase clothing to sell and acquire materials to build her house

loans.name: Alfredo Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Alfredo se dedica a la venta y comercialización de CD´s y DVD´s desde hace ya bastantes años y es de esta forma que él ha logrado subsistir y progresar durante los 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad. Don Alfredo es nacido en la ciudad de La Paz y actualmente vive de forma independiente, es decir es soltero. Don Alfredo trabaja con la institución desde el 2007 y es el cliente más antiguo o uno de los más antiguos de la institución, razón por la cual no se le negó dicho crédito, además de aquello a tenido un comportamiento crediticio ejemplar y incluso cuenta con su propia cuenta de ahorro en la institución, el dinero del crédito es para comprar un lote de películas y videos, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado durante todo este tiempo.
texts.en:
Sr. Alfredo has been buying and selling CDs and DVDs for several years as means of surviving and progressing. He has been in this business for ten years. Don Alfredo was born in the city of La Paz and now lives independently. He is single.

Don Alfredo has worked with Emprender since 2007. He is a long-time client and one of the oldest of Emprender. For this reason, he has never been denied a loan. In addition, he has an exemplary credit history and has built up his own savings. The money from this loan will be used to buy movies and videos. He is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided throughout this entire time.

loans.use: Purchase movies and music videos

loans.name: Rio Lindo Group

texts.es:
el grupo Rio Lindo esta integrado por 3 mujeres muy trabajadoras y amigas, este grupo esta ubicado en la colonia  Buena Vista de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellas realizan.
doña Sonia Marleny D. tiene 36 años de edad, es madre de cuatro hijos y esta casada.
Se dedica a la venta de ropa.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa, en esta epoca de navidad la ropa se vende muy bien.

la señora Antonia M. C. tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera y se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortillas desde hace 13 años, negocio con el cual a educado y mantenido a sus hijos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de maiz, cal, leña.
 
doña Karina Janeth D. S. tiene 24 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de cuatro hijos,  su esposo le ayuda economicamente.
Karina se dedica a la elaboracion de pan, tamales, tortas y pasteles.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para fabricar sus panes.

todas son muy unidas, desean trabajar y salir adelante con sus familias.
texts.en:
The Rio Lindo group is made up of three very hard-working and friendly women.  This group is located in the Buena Vista residential development in the city of San Lorenzo.  We detail their different business activities below:

Sonia Marleny D. is 36 years old.  She is married and has four children.  She sells clothes.  Her loan will be used to buy clothes, which sell very well during the Christmas season.

Antonia M. C. is 51 years old.  She is a single mother who makes and sells tortillas.  She has been in this business for 13 years and it has helped her to educate and support her children.  She will use her loan to buy corn, lime and firewood.
 
Karina Janeth D. S. is 24 years old.  She is married and has four children.  Her husband helps her financially.  Karina makes bread, tamales and cakes.  She will use her loan to buy ingredients to make her bread.

All the women are very united.  They would like to work and get ahead with their families.

loans.use: To buy clothes, flour, firewood, corn, lime, sugar, flavorings, wheat flour, eggs, margarine, butter, yeast and baking soda

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su hija de 6 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 28 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de tamales pisques (con frijoles), y de gallina, este negocio fue iniciativa propia a raíz de ser madre soltera, la venta la realiza todos los días de 4:00pm a 7:00pm, en el mercado municipal de El Transito, este negocio es la ayuda a solventar las necesidades del hogar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar los materiales necesarios para preparar los tamales, como maíz, pollo, frijoles, hojas, y condimentos, este préstamo le ayudara a incrementar su venta y a crecer en la producción de los tamales, con esta inversión espera tener mejores ingresos para cubrir las necesidades cotidianas.
Aspira mantenerse en el negocio a largo plazo, seguir generando ingresos para sacar adelante a su hija y velar por su sano crecimiento.
texts.en:
María resides in El Transito, Department of San Miguel. She is 28 years old, a single mother, and has a 6 year old daughter. María sells chicken tamales with beans. She started this business because she is a single mother. Her sales are conducted every day from 4pm to 7pm at the municipal market of El Transito. This business helps cover the household needs.

She is requesting a loan to buy necessary supplies for preparing tamales such as corn, chicken, beans, leaves, and condiments. This loan will help increase her sales and her production of tamales. With this investment, she hopes to have more income to cover her living expenses.

María hopes to maintain her business in the long term and continue generating income so that her daughter can get ahead and grow up healthy.

loans.use: Purchase corn, chicken, beans, leaves, and condiments

loans.name: Primitiva

texts.es: Primitiva, de 34 años, convive con Sergio, de 33 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Mirla de 11 y Nelsi, de 9 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. El principal trabajo de Primitiva, es la compra y venta de animales menores como: cerdos, gallinas, corderos, y cuyes, los que alimenta y engorda para luego revenderlos en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Pero hace un año, compró un auto con el que realiza trasporte público; cubriendo las rutas Palcamayo y Tarma; en esté negocio, Primitiva obtuvo, muy buenos resultados, pues según menciona; existe poco acceso a los poblados lejanos de la localidad, donde la mayoría de sus habitantes necesita trasladarse a la ciudad para comprar víveres, comestibles y negociar sus cultivos y demás trabajos independientes que realizan. Por ello, está pensando adquirir un auto más, con el que pueda obtener mejores ganancias, y cubrir la demanda de falta de movilidad. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como socia nueva de su banco comunal, se siente alegre de poder compartir su éxito con los demás integrantes. Con el monto que solicita completará el dinero que ahorro para la compra de un auto nuevo, con el cual piensa abastecer la demanda del trasporte público en los anexos lejanos de la ciudad de Tarma.
texts.en: Primitiva, 34 years old, lives with Sergio, 33 years old. They have 2 children: Mirla, 11 years old, and Nelsi, 9 years old. They live together as a family in their own house, located in Ricrican. Primitiva's main job is buying and selling small animals, like pigs, hens, lambs, and guinea pigs, which she feeds and fattens up to later resell in the central market in the city of Tarma. However, a year ago, she bought an automobile for providing public transportation, covering the Palcamayo and Tarma routes. With this business, Primitiva says she has had very good results. There is little access to the villages that are far from town, where most of the residents have to get to the city to buy supplies and groceries, trade their crops and do other standalone jobs. Therefore, she is thinking of acquiring another automobile, with which she could make greater profits and meet the demand due to lack of mobility. This is her second loan with MFP, and as a new member of her communal bank, she is happy to be able to share her success with the other members. The amount she is requesting, together with the money she has saved, will be enough to buy a new automobile, which she plans to use to meet the demand for public transportation in the surrounding areas far from the city of Tarma.

loans.use: It will complete the amount needed to buy an automobile to be used for public transportation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction materials, such as cement and sand, for home improvements

loans.name: Patricia Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth es comerciante, tiene una tienda de barrio en una zona peri urbana de la ciudad,  ella tiene cuatro hijos, tres de su primer matrimonio y uno del actual.  Su esposo es transportista, trabaja de taxista en el área urbana ambos trabajan muy duro para la manutención de su hogar, recientemente construyeron en su lote y es donde habitan antes Vivian en alquiler aunque es alejada la zona ellos están muy felices por que ya es su casa y tienen mayor libertad y comodidad. El Sr. Víctor lleva  a su esposa todos los días al mercado para abastecerse de insumos para la tienda como ser, carne, pan y otros insumos que tienen rotación diaria, ellos salen a las seis de la mañana y doña Elizabeth tiene que retornar a su domicilio sola con los bultos caminando por que el micro que la traslada la deja a siete cuadras de su domicilio, con el dinero del crédito comprara calaminas para la construcción de un tinglado para su tiendita, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Elizabeth is a merchant who has a neighborhood store in a periurban section of the city. She has four children, three from her first marriage and one from her current one. Her husband works in transportation, driving a taxi in the urban areas. They both work hard to support their household and recently constructed on their lot. Previously they had rented in a distant area but are now very happy to have their house as well as greater freedom and comfort.

Sr. Victor brings his wife to the market every day so that she can stock up on supplies for her store such as meat, bread, and other items that sell on a daily basis. They leave at 6am and Doña Elizabeth returns home alone by walking with her packages since the market is seven blocks from her house. The money from this loan will be used to buy roofing sheets to build a shed for her little store.

She is very grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: Purchase materials to build a storage shed for her store

loans.name: Bernardina Santos

texts.es:
Bernardina, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de frutas tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su hija de 12 años de edad llamada María Nicolasa, el negocio es vender las frutas preparadas sin cascara y cortada en trozos.
Bernardina tiene la necesidad de un préstamo para comprar frutas como manzanas, naranjas, sandias, melones y poder realizar la venta, ya que en ocasiones se queda sin frutas. Este préstamo le ayudara a mantenerse con el negocio y a generar para su hija los ingresos necesarios para cubrir sus necesidades. 
Su objetivo es mejorar el negocio, invertirle para que sea más estable y ayudar a su hija en la superación de sus estudios.
texts.en:
Bernardina lives in San Miguel, which is in San Miguel Department.  She sells fruits.  Bernardina is 33 years old and lives with her 12-year-old daughter, María Nicolasa.  Her business is selling fruits that she has peeled and cut into pieces.

Bernardina needs a loan to buy fruits like apples, oranges, watermelon and melons so she can sell them because sometimes she runs out of fruit.  The loan will help her to keep the business going and generate the necessary income to take care of her daughter's needs.
 
Her goal is to improve the business and invest in it so it can be more stable and she can help her daughter do well in her studies.

loans.use: Purchase fruits like apples, oranges, watermelon, melons

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 34 años, está casada con Clemente, de 39 años de edad. Ambos tienen 4 hijos: Clemente, de 18, Luis, de 15, Kevin, de 8 y Ángela, de 6 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. Hace 10 años que está trabajadora mujer, se dedica a la agricultura; sus principales sembríos constan de papa, el cual después de cuidarlo y fertilizarlo constantemente, lo vende en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que le molesta a Norma, son las constantes plagas de insectos que invaden sus cultivos, pero gracias a su experiencia ella está logrando salir adelante, su objetivo es tener cada día sembríos de mejor calidad. Paralelamente a sus cultivos, ella se dedica al cuidado de sus 20 cabezas de reses, los cuales engorda para después revenderlos. “Mi objetivo, es sacar adelante a mis hijos, y brindarles una buena educación”, afirma. Este es el  segundo crédito con MFP, y como socia nueva de su banco comunal, se siente feliz por el apoyo y asesoramiento que recibe. Con el monto que solicita comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, que esparcirá en sus sembríos de papa, que cosechará dentro de algunos meses.
texts.en:
Norma, 34, is married to Clemente, who is 38 years old.  They have four children:  Clemente (18), Luis (15), Kevin (8) and Ángela (6).  The family lives in their own house in the town of Ricrican.

Ten years ago, this hardworking woman started farming.  Her main crops are potatoes, which she tends and fertilizes constantly before selling them in the central market in the city of Tarma.  The constant plagues of insects that invade the crops bother Norma, but thanks to her experience, she is managing to move ahead.  Her goal is to keep having higher quality crops.   Along with her crops, she takes care of 20 head of cattle, which she fattens to resell.  "My goal is to help my children get ahead, and to give them a good education," she says.

This is her second loan with MFP, and as a new member of her communal bank, she is happy for the support and advice that she receives.  With the loan money she will buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to spread on her potato plants, which she will harvest in a few months.

loans.use: Buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Arca De Noe Group

texts.es:
el grupo arca de noe, esta integrado 3 mujeres y esta ubicado en la aldea Fray Lazaro, a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellas realizan:

la sra. Diana Patricia S. tiene 40 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de cuatro niños. su esposo le ayuda economicamente, Diana se dedica a la venta de pescados y refrescos.
los fines de semana vende golosinas en su casa de habitacion.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de pescado y refrescos.

la señora Tedis Estela R. O. tiene 22 años de edad, esta soltera y es madre de una niña.
Tedis se dedica a la venta de venta de ropa nueva, tambien vende golosinas.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de pantalones, blusas y dos fardos de harina de maiz para hacer las golosinas.
 
doña Mayra Jacquelin R. tiene 29 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos y se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de rosquillas, pan, tamales, y pastelitos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de de maiz, leña, cuajada, queso, manteca, azucar. 

todas son muy amigas y muy unidas y tienen muchos deseos de salir adelante.
texts.en:
The 'Arca de Noe' (Noah's Ark) group is made up of three women and is located in the village of Fray Lazaro.  Below we detail the women's different business activities:

Diana Patricia S. is 40 years old.  She is married and has four children.  Her husband helps her financially.  Diana sells fish and soft drinks.  On weekends she sells sweet treats from her home.  She will use her loan to buy fish and soft drinks.

Tedis Estela R. O. is 22 years old.  She is single and has one daughter.  Tedis sells new clothes.  She also sells sweet treats.  She will use her loan to buy pants, blouses and two packs of corn flour to make her sweet treats.

Mayra Jacquelin R. is 29 years old.  She has three children and she makes and sells 'rosquillas' (a type of doughnut), bread, tamales and 'pastelitos' (pastries made from puff pastry with a sweet or savory filling).   She will use her loan to buy corn, firewood, 'cuajada' (a compact cheese-like product), cheese, butter and sugar.

The group are very friendly and very united and they have a great desire to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, fish, flour, eggs, firewood, corn, clothes, oil, butter, potatoes, chicken, tomatoes, cabbage, onion, cheese, sugar and 'cuajada'

loans.name: Maritza Augusta

texts.es:
La Señorita Maritza G. es socia de banco comunal Prosperidad, vive en el centro de la ciudad de C., esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones la misma que es muy amable y cordial.

La Señorita. Maritza tiene 37 años de edad, es soltera y vive independiente en un departamento que es de su propiedad, se dedica a laborar como auxiliar contable, actividad que desempeña hace 17 años, trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche. En sus tiempos libres también se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo actividad que realiza hace 3 años.

Es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue invitada por su hermana quien es socia activa del banco, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en ropa para surtir más su mercadería. Su meta es tener su propio local para vender su mercadería.
texts.en:
Maritza G. is a member of the community bank Prosperidad [Prosperity] and lives in the center of the city of C., a city known for its beautiful architecture.  People maintain their culture and traditions and they are very kind and friendly.

Maritza is 37 years old, single, and lives independently in an apartment that she owns.  She has worked as a junior accountant for 17 years.  She works from Monday to Friday from 8:00am until 7:00pm.  In her free time, she sells clothing from catalogs.  She has done this for three years.

This is her first loan with the community bank.  Her sister, who is an active member of the community bank, invited her to join.  She will use the loan to purchase more merchandise.  Her goal is to have her own store to sell clothing.

loans.use: Purchase clothes

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto, de 27 años, convive con Haydee, de 25 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Jefferson, de 6 y Renzo de un año de edad. En unión familiar ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. La actividad económica de esté trabajador hombre, es la agricultura. Sus principales cultivos constan de tubérculos como: papa y olluco; “mis padres me enseñaron todo lo necesario, sobre las técnicas de cultivo”, menciona. Los buenos cuidados que le ofrece constantemente a sus sembríos, hacen que sus cosechas sean buenas y con mucha demanda en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Ya tiene 10 años dedicándose a está ardua labor; y ahora Alberto, no solo sigue sembrando, también compró varias cabezas de carneros, los que ahora ya están creciendo fuertes y saludables. Seguro de la voluntad y la fuerza que tiene, ahora él está invirtiendo más en la mejora de sus cultivos. Esté es el noveno crédito con MFP, y como integrante de su banco comunal, es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora. Con el monto que solicita comprará 10 sacos de abono orgánico, que oscila entre los 100 soles cada uno, y si el crédito le alcanza invertirá en el mantenimiento de sus terrenos agrícolas; para ello necesitará peones, que tendrá que contratar para que le ayuden en la limpieza de la maleza que crece en el campo.
texts.en:
Alberto is 27 years old.  He lives with his partner, 25 year-old Haydee.  Together they have 2 children: 6 year-old Jefferson and 1 year-old Renzo.  They live in their own home which is located in the town of Ricrican.  This hard-working man is a farmer.  His main crops are tubers such as potatoes and 'olluco' (a native tuber).  "My parents taught me everything I needed to know about cultivation techniques", he says.

The good care that Alberto constantly takes of his crops means that his harvests are good and are in great demand in Tarma's central market.  He has been doing this hard work for 10 years.  Now Alberto not only continues growing crops but he also bought several rams which are now growing strong and healthy.  Alberto is certain of the willpower and strength that he has and so he is investing some more in improving his crops.

This is Alberto's ninth loan with MFP and he is a responsible and very hard-working member of his community bank.  He will use his loan money to buy 10 sacks of organic fertilizer which costs around 100 Peruvian soles a sack and, if the loan money stretches far enough, he will also invest in maintaining his farmland.  For this, he needs laborers who he will hire to help clear the weeds that are growing on his land.

loans.use: To buy 10 sacks of organic fertilizer and to hire laborers to help him weed his land

loans.name: Nora Lucia

texts.es:
Nora de 32 años, hace varios años atrás trabajo en una empresa de fabricación de enlatados de atún en donde quiso independizarse y tener su propio negocio ya que su esposo la abandono con sus dos hijas.

Viviendo en un cantón llamado Playas (Posorja) uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos con sus dos hijas ha estado trabajando vendiendo productos Yanbal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes).  Por el buen trabajo que realizo en la empresa pudo conseguir varias amistades que le ayudan ahora comprándole los productos. Vende perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, tratamientos etc. 

Quiere seguir trabajando en el medio de la venta de productos Yanbal por eso quiere con el préstamo comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos. En el futuro quiere tener un local en el centro para vender los productos y así darle un mejor futuro a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Nora is 32 years old and several years ago worked at a factory canning tuna. There she decided she wanted to start working independently and start her own business since her husband left her with their two daughters. She lives in a region called Playas (Posorja), one of the tourist areas of Ecuador that has a great variety of seafood. She lives with her two daughters and works selling Yanbal products. This is an organization that helps enterprising women begin their own independent saleswork. Through her hard work with the company she formed many friendships and these friends now help her by buying her products. She sells perfumes, lotions, deodorants, treatments, etc.

She wants to keep working selling Yanbal products and for this reason she wants a loan to buy perfumes, lotions, and cosmetics. In the future she wants to have a shop downtown to sell the products and be able to provide her children with a better future.

loans.use: Perfumes, lotions

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: El señor Luis Alfonso C. C., es mayor de edad, es casado y su esposa se dedica al comercio de las frutas y verduras, es agricultor desde hace 22 años, ellos son una familia de 4 hijos mayores que trabajan y apoyan a sus padres en las labores del hogar, en el negocio se ha enfrentado a problemas de infección de insectos y fue con el apoyo de su esposa y su esfuerzo propio que su finca ha sido de buena bonanza, el solicita un préstamo para erradicar el problema de las plagas, a favor de que la producción se multiplique y favorezca las ventas, a futuro espera que se pueda, diversificar las cosechas por otras que le sean más rentables y mejoren día a día sus condiciones socio económicas, así como la remodelación de su casita para sus días de retiro con su esposa.
texts.en: Luis Alfonso C. C. is an elderly gentleman.  He is married and his wife sells fruits and vegetables.  Luis Alfonso has been a farmer for 22 years.  He and his wife have four grown-up children who work and support their parents with the household chores.  In his business, Luis Alfonso has faced problems with insect infestations but, with the support of his wife and through his own hard work, his farm has been very successful.  He is requesting a loan to eradicate the problem of insect infestations so that his production will increase and he will enjoy better sales.  In the future, he hopes that he will be able to diversify his harvests, growing other products that will be more profitable.  He also hopes to improve his socio-economic conditions from day to day and to remodel his small home for his retirement together with his wife.

loans.use: To maintain plant health

loans.name: Trancito Lucia

texts.es:
La Señora Transito G. es socia del banco comunal Prosperidad, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones la misma que es muy amable y cordial.

Nuestra socia tiene 52 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 28, 26, 24, 18 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, su segundo hijo es especial el cual está en una silla de ruedas y tiene que estar a su cuidado, sus dos últimas hijas estudian en la universidad. Su esposo labora en una carpintería, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.

Doña Transito se dedica a la cría de  pollos y cuyes, actividad que desempeña hace 5 años, también se dedica a la agricultura en donde siembra hortalizas y todos sus productos los vende en su propia comunidad.

Es el segundo crédito y sus primas quienes conforman la banca comunal le han invitado, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y su alimento. Su meta es  tener un galpón de pollo más grande.
texts.en:
Señora Trancito G. is a member of the community bank Prosperidad (Prosperity). She lives in the Miraflores sector of the city of Cuenca. This city is known for its architectural beauty. Its people maintain its culture and traditions and are kind and cordial.

This bank member is 52 years old. She is married and has children of 28, 26, 24, and 18 years of age. Her oldest daughter is married and lives indenpendently. Her second child, a son, has special needs: he is in a wheelchair and needs to be in her care. Her two youngest daughters study at the university. Her husband works as a carpenter. With their combined work as a couple, they have succeeded in constructing their own house.

Doña Trancito's work is raising chickens and guinea pigs. She has been doing this for 5 years. She also works in agriculture, planting vegetables and selling all her products in her own community.

This is her second loan. Her cousins who are in the community bank invited her to join. She is going to invest her new loan in the purchase of chickens and chicken feed. Her goal is to have a bigger chicken coop.

loans.use: Buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es: Teofila, de 50 años, está casada con Víctor, de 52 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos: Juana, de 16, Elmer, de 12 y Eloy, de14 años de edad; en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Ricrican. La siembra de tubérculos como papa y olluco; es su principal actividad. Ya tiene más de 20 años dedicándose a la agricultura. Pero según afirma, lo que más le gusta a ella, es cuidar de sus 20 cabezas de reses, los que engorda y después los vende en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma. Desde adolescente Teofila, comenzó a apoyar a sus padres en el cuidado y mejora de sus cultivos y hasta ahora se siente feliz de poder pasar sus días en el campo. Ahora Teofila, quiere seguir mejorando la calidad de sus productos, con ello asegura podrá vender a mayor precio sus cosechas. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, y según afirma, se siente contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal, donde las personas son personas responsables y comprometidas. Con el monto que solicita comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, los que esparcirá en sus diferentes sembríos de tubérculos.
texts.en: Teofila is 50 years old, married to Victor, 52.  Both have six children, three live with them at their house located in Ricrican: Juana; 16, Elmer; 12, and Eloy; 14.  Her main activity is growing tubers such as potato and olluco (a native tuber).  She has more than 20 years of experience working in agriculture. What she likes the most is taking care of her 20 heads of cattle, she raises them and then sells them at the central market in the city of Tarma. When she was a teenager, she started helping her parents in the care and maintenance of their crops and to this day she feels happy to spend her days in the field. For now, Teofila wants to improve the quality of her products, because she would be able to sell at a higher price.  This is her fifth loan with MFP, and as she indicates she is happy to belong to the community bank, where people are responsible and committed.  With the requested amount she will buy several sacs of organic fertilizer to use in the tuber fields.

loans.use: Buy sacs of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Juana Marina

texts.es:
doña Juana Marina C. tiene 51 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de dos hijos.
su esposo se dedica al negocio del transporte y Juana se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y calzado.
viven en el Barrio San Jose de la ciudad de San Lorenzo.
su negocio lo abre de lunes a domingo, tiene una empleada que le ayuda a atender los clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de blusas, pantalones y zapatos.
desea tener su negocio bien surtido para la epoca de navidad.
texts.en:
Juana Marina C. is 51 years old, she is married and mother of two children. Her husband works in the transport business and Juana sells new clothing and footware. They live in the San Jose neighbourhood of the city of San Lorenzo. 

She opens her business from Monday to Friday, and she has one employee who helps her serve the customers. She will use this loan for the purchase of blouses, pants, and shoes. She would like to have her business well stocked for the Christmas season.

loans.use: Purchase of ladies, men's and children's clothing

loans.name: Mercy Marisol

texts.es:
La Señora. Mercy G. es socia del banco comunal Prosperidad, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones la misma que es muy amable y cordial.

Doña Mercy es costurera actividad que desempeña hace 15 años, elabora ternos para compromisos sociales, labora en su propio taller ya que este oficio lo ha aprendió trabajando en otras fabricas, labora de lunes a viernes sin tener un horario fijo.

La Señora. Mercy tiene 37 años, es casada y tiene un hijo de 18 años de edad que estudia en la universidad. Su esposo no se encuentra en el país, ha migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de un familiar. 

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal  y fue invitada por su cuñada ha formar parte del banco, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materia prima como es tela, hilos, etc. Su meta es agrandar su taller.
texts.en:
Señora Mercy G. is a member of the community bank Prosperidad (Prosperity). She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known for its architectural beauty. Its people maintain its culture and traditions and are kind and cordial.

Doña Mercy is a seamstress, an activity that she began 15 years ago. She makes men's suits for special social events. She works in her own workshop, having learned this trade by working in other factories. She works from Monday to Friday without a fixed schedule.

Señora Mercy is 37 years old. She is married and has a son who is 18 and studies at the university. Her husband is not in the country. He emigrated in search of a better job. She does not have her own house, so she lives in the house of a relative.

This is the first loan that she has taken out with the community bank, and she was invited by her sister-in-law to become part of the bank. She is going to invest the money from her loan in the purchase of materials such as fabrics, thread, etc. Her goal is to enlarge her workshop.

loans.use: Buy fabrics, thread, buttons, fasteners, etc.

loans.name: María Livia

texts.es:
La Señora. María C. es socia del banco comunal Prosperidad, vive por el sector de la Feria Libre en la Ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones la misma que es muy amable y cordial.

La Señora. María tiene 29 años, vive en unión libre y tiene 5 hijos de 12, 8, 7, 1 años y su ultimo hijo de 2 meses, sus tres primeros hijos estudian en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo se dedica a la confección de ropa deportiva, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña María trabaja junto a su esposo confeccionando la ropa deportiva, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 8 años, su esposo le ha enseñado este oficio y tienen un pequeño taller que es de su propiedad, laboran desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche y no descansan un solo día ya que trabajan de domingo a domingo.
 
Este es su primer crédito y  fue invitada por una compañera que es socia del banco comunal, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materia prima como  telas, hilos, etc. Su meta es tener un taller más grande.
texts.en:
María C. is a member of the 'Prosperidad' community bank.  She lives in the Feria Libre sector of the city of Cuenca.  This city is known for its architectural beauty and its people who maintain its culture and traditions.  The people are also very kind and friendly.

María is 29 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 5 children aged 12, 8, 7, 1 and 2 months.  Her eldest three children study in a school in the city.  Her husband makes sports clothes.  They don't have their own home but rent instead.

María works together with her husband making sports clothes.  She has been in this business for eight years.  Her husband taught her the trade and they have their own small workshop.  They work there from 6.00am to 7.00pm.  They don't rest a single day but work from Sunday to Sunday.
 
This is María's first loan and she was invited to join her community bank by a friend who was already a member.  She will invest her loan in buying raw material such as fabric, thread, etc.  Her goal is to have a bigger workshop.

loans.use: To buy fabric, buttons, thread, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Juana Irene

texts.es: La señora Juana comienza a trabajar con la institución desde el año 2007 como cliente individual, desde el momento que comenzó siempre ha sido una cliente puntal y responsable.  La señora se dedica a la venta de verduras por mayor en el mercado Rodríguez.  Doña Juana tiene tres hijos una de 15 años, otra de 10 años y la menor de 4 años ella sola saca a sus hijos adelante preocupándose por sus estudios y de su alimentación, ella vive en casa de un pariente. La cliente solicita el crédito para realizar  compra de verduras por mayor y pagar por adelantado a las personas que le proveen de las verduras para que ella pueda vender, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Juana has been active with the loan institution as an individual customer since 2007.  Since then she has always been a punctual, dependable customer.  She sells vegetables wholesale at the Rodríguez market.  

Juana has three children, ages 15, 10 and 4.  She lives in a relative's house and has been the sole provider for her children, always concerned about their education and food.  She plans to use the loan she is requesting to buy wholesale vegetables and be able to pay cash to her suppliers.

She is very grateful to the loan institution for the support she has received.

loans.use: To buy vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Cosoltepec Group

texts.es:
Esta unidad de desarrollo (UDE) se llama Cosoltepec que significa cerro del Paisan y han llamado su grupo así porque todos los miembros son originarios de esta comunidad, ellos se reúnen cada semana en el domicilio de su representante la señora Lorenza Narahulda  L. C. que se encuentra ubicado en la colonia “Agrícola” que pertenece al municipio de “San M. Soyaltepec” en el estado de Oaxaca este grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes y este es su préstamo número 6 con FRAC.
La señora Lorenza Narahulda  L., "Nara" como la conocen en su comunidad tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos 2 mujeres y 1 hombre. Ella tiene una taquería llamada "La mixtequilla" ubicada en la carretera a Temazcal en la comunidad de Cosoltepec. Ella desea su préstamo para poder comprar carne, refrescos, tomates, chiles, cebolla, tortillas, refrescos, servilletas y bolsas para la preparación y venta de sus tacos. Nara nos dijo que ya tiene 3 años con su negocio y que gracias al apoyo su negocio ha crecido poco a poco. Ella espera darles estudios a sus hijos para que en un futuro sean profesionistas y no les tengan que sufrir.
Don Mario P. S. también es miembro del grupo Cosoltepec el tiene 44 años es casado y tiene 3 hijos 2 mujeres y un hombre. El tiene una pequeña carpintería en su hogar en la calle niños héroes numero 16, el  necesita el crédito para poder comprar madera, clavos y barniz para poder realizar sus muebles y posteriormente venderlos. El espera que con las ganancias pueda invertir en mas material, darle estudios a su hija la más pequeña que tiene 12 años y superarse para lograr el bienestar de su familia
Los otros 8 integrantes son:
Magdalena C. N. cría de cerdos
Michel López Ramírez siembra de maíz
Emiliana S. Hernández venta de antojitos mexicanos(tamales)
Leonor González Pérez tienda de ropa (sabanas, cortinas, toallas, pantalones y blusas)
Arcelia M. E. venta de ropa de cama y ropa típica de la región
Mara Iveth Ramírez L. venta de dulces y aguas frescas
José Alfredo M. M. tienda de ropa dama y caballero
Alicia R. E. venta de abarrotes
texts.en:
