This is a development unit called Cosoltepec which means Paisan Hill.  The group decided on this name because all the members are from this community.  They meet once a week in the home of Mrs. Lorenza Harahulda L. C. who lives in the "Farming" colony that belongs to the town of "San M. Soyaltepec" in the state of Oaxaca.  The group is comprised of 10 members and this is their sixth loan through FRAC.

Mrs. Lorenza Narahulda L., known as "Nara" in the community, is 42 years old, married, and has two daughters and a son.  She owns a taco stand called "La mixtequilla" located on the road to Temazcal in the town of Cosoltepec.  She is requesting the loan to buy meat, softdrinks, tomatoes, chiles, onion, tortillas, napkins and bags for the preparation and sale of her tacos.  Nara told us that she's had this business for three years and thanks to the support she has been able to grow her business little by little.  She hopes to be able to provide an education to her children so they may become professionals and not live in hardship.

Mr. Mario P. S. is also a member of the Cosoltepec group.  He is 44 years old, married and has two daughters and a son.  He owns a small carpentry shop in his home in Niños Héroes Street, number 16.  He needs the loan to buy lumber, nails and varnish so he can make furniture and then sell it.  He hopes to invest his earnings in more material, and provide an education for his youngest daughter who is 12 years old.  Hopefully in this way he will improve his family's living conditions.

The other 8 members in the group are:
Magdalena C. N. who raises pigs
Michel López Ramírez who grows corn
Emiliana S. Hernández who has a Mexican tamales stand
Leonor González Pérez who has a clothing shop (bed sheets, curtains, towels, pants and blouses)
Arcelia M. E. who sells bed linens and typical regional clothing
Mara Iveth Ramírez L. who sells sweets and bottled water
José Alfredo M. M. who has a ladies' and gentlemens' clothing store
Alicia R. E. sho sells groceries

loans.use: To buy corn, lumber, groceries, clothing, sweets and pig feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bulk footwear

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor tiene 36 años, es muy empeñosa y le gusta hacer bien su trabajo, es madre de 2 hijas, y vive con su esposo, en casa de sus suegros. Desde hace 6 años, Flor se dedica al tejido y bordado de chompas. Los meses de mayor trabajo para ella, es de mayo a noviembre, ya que es temporada de invierno, asimismo tiene mucha demanda del extranjero; es por ello que le presta toda su atención y concentración a esta actividad. Día a día Flor trabaja muy contenta en su labor y lo que más le gusta es que lo realiza en la comodidad de su casa, sin descuidar de sus hijas ni de su hogar. Para el futuro tiene pensado incursionar en la venta de comida, por ello desea tener su restaurante. Es su noveno crédito con MFP, por lo que se ha comprometido nuevamente en ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas, considerando éste crédito muy útil para el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, invertirá en la compra de lana e hilos en variados colores, asimismo mandará hacer puertas y ventanas para mejorar su casa y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Flor is 36 years old, very earnest and enjoys doing a good job.  She is the mother of two daughters and lives with her husband and parents-in-law.  Since she was six years old Flor has been knitting and making embroidered jackets.  Most of her work is between May and November since it is the winter season.  She receives many orders from overseas so she is very careful to pay full attention and concentrate on her work.

Flor is very happy to be able to work out of the comfort of her home where she can attend to her daughters and household chores.  She has future plans to go into the food selling business and would like to open a restaurant.  

This is the ninth loan she has requested through MFP and she is fully committed to making the payments on time, considering the loan to be very helpful in growing her business.  She will use the loan to buy wool and yarn in different colors; and also plans to install doors and windows in order to mprove her home and quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wool and yarn, and to have doors and windows put in her house

loans.name: Doris

texts.es: La Sra. Doris llego a las instalaciones de nuestra institución por recomendación de uno de nuestros clientes que ya habían sido beneficiados al igual que ella, con un  préstamo. Doris vive en la zona de la Pampa de la Isla, cuenta con casa propia en la cual vive con sus tres hijos ya que hace aproximadamente 1 año atrás se habían separado con su esposo, cuenta con negocio propio en su mismo domicilio es una tienda de barrio el cual maneja desde hace 1 año y medio, el refinanciamiento del crédito es para la inversión en el mismo negocio, (Sidras, Panteones, Vinos y otros por la época de fin de año), ya que por el momento no tiene competencia por donde vive, y quiere aprovechar esta oportunidad. "les agradezco mucho por haberme apoyado cuando los necesitaba" nos dijo.
texts.en:
Doris came to our loan institution through another one of our customers who has also received a loan.  Doris lives in an area called Pampa de la Isla.  She owns her own home where she lives with her three children since becoming separated from her husband about a year ago.  She has been operating a neighborhood store out of her home for over a year and a half.

The refinancing of the loan will be used to invest in her business (cider, softdrinks, wines and other products for the New Year season).  For now she has no competitors where she lives and she wants to take advantage of the situation.  "I am very grateful for the support I received when I needed it.", she tells us.

loans.use: To buy cider, softdrinks, wine, etc.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: La  señora Dora es un cliente que ya trabajo muchas secuencias en la institución, en los anteriores crédito demostró responsabilidad, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva de mujer y de hombre, la ropa que adquiere la señora es de buena calidad y muy moderna, su negocio esta ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico de la ciudad de el alto , es un lugar es estratégico porque existe gran cantidad de cliente en esta feria, la feria en esta fecha esta repleta por las fiestas de fin de año, la señora tiene dos hijos de 6 y dos años, su esposo por el poco  trabajo que existe en Bolivia tuvo que emigrar al país de Brasil a trabajar,  desde ahí manda remesas a su esposa y familia, el crédito será invertido en la compra de pantalones por docenas, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado .
texts.en: Dora has gone through various loan cycles with the organization. With the past loans she has show responsibility. She sells new clothing for both men and women. The items of clothing that she purchases are of good quality and very modern. Her business is located in a very strategic location in the city of El Alto. It is a strategic location for the large number of visitors to the neighborhood. The neighborhood is very busy especially for the end of year celebrations. She has two children, aged 6 and 2 years old. Her husband emigrated from Bolivia for the lack of employment opportunities. He went to Brazil to work and from there he sends support to his wife and family. The loan will be invested in the purchase of dozens of pants. She is very grateful to the organization for the support they have provided her.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Jenitt

texts.es: Jenitt, de 35 años, es una madre de familia muy dedicada, es separada y por el momento vive en una casa ajena. Día a día recorre las calles arenales de su distrito, ofreciendo productos de belleza, ya sea por medio de catálogos o de algunos que tiene en stock. Más de un año que se dedica a la venta de éstos productos y ha logrado ganar varios clientes, lo cual le vuelven a renovar otros pedidos y eso le conviene a Jenitt. Lo que más le gusta de su negocio, es la amistad que tiene con sus clientes y las ofertas que realiza la empresa, ya que en estas temporadas sus ganancias son el doble. En adelante, anhela construir su casa de material noble, de ese modo mejorará su estilo de vida y la de sus hijos. Para ella es su primer crédito con MFP, y se compromete en pagar todas sus cuotas, de esa manera no perjudicará a los integrantes de su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicitó, incrementará más productos de belleza, para abastecer los pedidos que le han solicitado.
texts.en: Jenitt is 35 years old. She is a mother and she is very devoted to her family. She is separated and for the time being she lives in a rented home. Day after day she travels the gravel roads of her district selling beauty products, be it through a catalogue or the items she's got in stock. She has been selling these products for more than a year and it has been good for Jenitt. What she most enjoys about the business is the contact she has with her clients. She also enjoys when the supplier has special offers, especially during this time of year when her sales double.  In the future she endeavors to build a house made of dependable materials in order to improve her way of life and that of her children. This is her first loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments. She does not want to cause trouble for the other members of her community bank. The loan she requested will be used to increase her stock of beauty products and to fill the orders that have already been placed.

loans.use: To purchase beauty products to fill orders that have already been placed.

loans.name: Meloma Group

texts.es:
El siguiente grupo que presento se llama "Meloma" lo integran 8 mujeres muy trabajadoras de la comunidad de San Francisco La Loma, está comunidad pertenece al municipio de San José del Rincon, México. San Francisco La Loma alberga familias cuya actividad se enfoca a la agricultura y ganaderia, despues encontramos el comercio, en lo general son tiendas de abarrotes o gente que sale a distintas plazas para ofrecer productos tales como plastico, cinturones o ropa.

El grupo "Meloma" no es la excepción por que sus 8 integrantes son amas de casa pero con un negocio o una actividad extra. Las mujeres que las integran son las siguientes:
1.-Francisca C. M., tiene 45 años de edad y su actividad es el comercio vendiendo los dias de plaza ropa para la familia
2.-Maria Guadalupe M. M.,  tiene 41 años de edad, es ama de casa, se dedica a criar pollos para  vender
3.-Maria Guadalupe R. R., tiene 73 años de edad, se dedica al hogar y a criar animales, en este caso becerros.
4.- Jovita M. S., tiene 50 años de edad, ama de casa y se dedica a atender una tienda de abarrotes
5.-Maria del Carmén T. R., tiene 47 años, se dedica  al hogar, y en su casa tiene una tienda de abarrotes.
6.-Isidra T. D., tiene 44 años, es ama de casa y su negocio es la cria de pollos para vender
7.-Maria Luisa R. R., tiene 26 años, es la más joven del grupo, ama de casa, y tambíen sale a vender los dias de plaza ropa para la familia
8.-Margarita C. M., tiene 47 años de edad, es la presidenta del grupo, ama de casa y se dedica a criar animales, por lo regular los animales que cria son borregos y pollos.

Todo el grupo se conocen desde que eran pequeños, se decidieron llamar "MELOMA" porqué es el como un apodo a la comunidad, San Francisco de la loma es "MELOMA".

Tambien cabe mencionar que es una comunidad "Mazahua", la mayor parte de la población adulta hablan este dialecto, sin embargo los niños lo han dejado de hacer, por eso en las escuelas primarias lo estan tratando de esnseñar para que los niños lo aprendan y este idioma no se pierda, es una materia más que los niños llevan en clase. 

Doña Margarita que de cariño la llaman doña Mago, es una mujer como mencionabamos Mazahua, es casada y en total tuvo 11 hijos, de casada cumplio 33 años, tiene casa propia y vive con su señor esposo, de los 11 hijos que tuvo 2 fallecieron y solo le quedan 9 hijos, 4 son mujeres y 5 hombres.

Hay dos personas que dependen de doña Mago, un hijo de 11 años que estudia el 5 año de primaria y una nieta de 4 años, solo estas dos persona dependen de doña Mago. El esposo de doña Mago es agricultor, no tiene un trabajo fijo, pero también cuando se puede se va a trabajar de albañil para tener más dinero.

Tambíen cabe mencionar que doña Mago es una mujer lider en su comunidad, hay gente que la sigue y la apoya en las desiciones que toma.

La mayor parte de la gente de la comunidad es gente sencilla y es gente humilde, como tambien es gente que cumple y que apoya se así se requiera.
texts.en:
This group is named "Meloma". It is made up of 8 very hard working women who live in the community of San Francisco La Loma. This community belongs to the municipality of San Jose del Rincon in Mexico. San Francisco La Loma's population consists of families who are agriculturists and farmers. There are also merchants who have general stores or those who travel to the various plazas to sell their products, such as plastics, belts, and clothing.

The group "Meloma" is not different from other group because the 8 members are house wives who have a business on the side. The women of the group are the following: 

1.-Francisca C. M.: she is 45 years old and she is a merchant who sells clothing for the entire family in the plazas.
2.-Maria Guadalupe M. M.: she is 41 years old, she is a house wife, and she raises chickens which she later sells. 
3.-Maria Guadalupe R. R.: she is 73 years old and she raises livestock. Currently she raises pigs.
4. - Jovita M. S.: she is 50 years old and she has a convenience store.
5.-Maria del Carmen T. R.: She is 47 years old and she has a convenience store.
6.-Isidra T. D.: She is 44 years old and she raises chickens which she later sells.
7.-Maria Luisa R. R.: she is 26 years old, the youngest in the group, had she also goes out to the plazas to sell clothing
8.-Margarita C. M.: she is 47 years old and she is the leader of the group. She raises livestock. Usually she raises sheep and chickens.

The members of the group know each other since they were children. They decided on the name "Meloma" because it is the nickname of the community: San Francisco de la Loma is "Meloma".

It should also be mentioned that the community is Mazahua, meaning that the majority of the adult population speak this dialect. But the kids have stopped learning the language, which is why the primary schools are trying to bring back the language so that it will not be lost. Language class is one of the courses kids take in school.

Margarita, who they affectionately cal Mago, is a Mazahua. She is married and she has 11 children. She has been married for 33 years. She lives in her own home and she lives together with her husband. Of the 11 children, 2 passed away so she only has 9 left; four are girls and 5 are boys. 

There are two that depend on Mago. Her 11-year old son is in grade 5 and she has a 4-year old granddaughter. They are her two last dependents. Mago's husband is an agriculturist. He doesn't have a steady job but whenever a construction job becomes available he takes it to have more money. 

It should also be mentioned that Mago is a leader in her community. There are people that follow her and support her in the decisions that she takes. 

For the most part the population is made up of simple and humble individuals with integrity and they support each other as needed.

loans.use: To purchase sheep and chickens to raise.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: El señor Marcos Antonio F. P., tiene la edad de 39 años, es casado y habitante del barrio Medardo Andino, con su esposa y sus 3 hijos adolecentes, mayores de edad, que le apoyan a su padre en las tareas del negocio, Don Marcos es Ebanista desde hace mas de 15 años, el alza de los precios del combustible les ha ocasionado múltiples problemas que le obstaculizan el desarrollo optimo de su empresa, es para su negocio que el solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima y poder enfrentar la demanda que ha observado ha crecido en los últimos días, esta inversión les aumentara el capital de trabajo y mejorara las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Marcos Antonio F. P. is 39 years old.  He is married and lives in Medardo Andino neighborhood with his wife and three grown-up children who support their father with the work in his business.  Marcos has been a cabinet maker for more than 15 years.  The rising price of fuel has caused him multiple problems which have placed obstacles in the way of him optimally developing his business.  He is requesting this loan for his business as he would like to buy raw materials so that he can fulfil the demand that he has noticed has been growing recently.  This investment will increase his working capital and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for his business

loans.name: Bernardino Abad

texts.es: El Sr. Bernardino Abad F. G. vive en el caserio casablanca junto a su esposa e hijos. Trabaja como obrero de campo en el fundo IQF desde hace algun tiempo. Su esposa se dedica a la venta de comida. El Sr. Bernardino requiere el crédito para terminar de construir su vivienda y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. El Sr. bernardino esta muy agradecido por el apoyo que le podamos brindar.
texts.en: Mr. Bernardino Abad F. G. lives in the community of Casablanca together with his wife and children. He has worked as a farm hand in Fundo IQF for some time. His wife sells prepared foods. Bernardino requires a loan to finish the construction of his home. He wants to provide his family with a better quality of life. Bernardino is very grateful for the support that he receives.

loans.use: To carry out some home improvements.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Luis vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Santiago. Tiene casa propia la cual la adquirio con sus ahorros. Trabaja como albañil por la zona. Requiere el crédito para realizar mejoras a su vivienda. El Sr. Luis está muy agradecido por el apoyo que le podamos brindar a travez de este financiamiento.
texts.en: Luis lives together with his children in the district of Santiago. He owns his house, having purchased it with his own savings. He is a construction worker in his region. He requires the loan to carry out some home improvements. Luis is very grateful for the support that he receives through this loan.

loans.use: To carry out some home improvements.

loans.name: John

texts.es: John, de 19 años, es un joven emprendedor con aspiraciones de triunfar en la vida, vive en casa de sus padres y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida. Este joven emprendedor, decidió independizarse y ayudar en la economía de su hogar, es así que sus días de semana se dedica a vender ropa, que por medio de pedidos se abastece de dicha mercadería, de igual manera trabaja con su motocarro, ofreciendo el servicio de transporte a sus vecinos. Pero el fin de semana se dedica al alquiler de luces sicodélicas, que tiene mucha demanda en los eventos como: quince años, aniversarios. De esta manera se ha propuesto salir adelante y apoyar la educación de sus hermanos; que aún son menores. Él es amante de todo tipo de trabajo que se presente y su anhelo es tener un negocio bien constituido. Accede al primer crédito con MFP, y hace compromiso de cumplir oportunamente las cuotas, de esa manera adherirse a posteriores ayudas. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará cables para luces, y llantas para su moto carro, en el que continuará ofreciendo servicio de transporte.
texts.en: John is 19 years old. He is a young business owner with great aspirations in life. He lives with his parents but his greatest wish is to improve the quality of their life. He decided to set out on his own and to contribute to the household finances. During business days he sells clothing, usually by taking orders for such items. He also has a motorcycle rickshaw and he offers transportation services to his neighbors. On the weekends he manages another business, renting lighting for special events, such as: sweet sixteen parties and anniversaries. He has set his mind on reaching his goals and to help pay for his younger siblings' education. He loves any work opportunity that presents itself and his goal is to have a well-established business. He requests a first time loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he is committed to making his payments on time, to ensure he will be able to access future loans. The loan he requests now will be used to purchase lighting cables and tires for his rickshaw, with which he will continue to offer transportation services.

loans.use: To purchase tires and lighting cables.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofía, es una madre empeñosa en hacer las cosas bien, vive en su casa propia, en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Después de haber trabajado por 7 años en la costura, ahora se consagra en el bordado de chompas, que lo realiza en su casa, sin descuidar a sus hijos. En este trabajo se siente realizada y sobre todo le gusta lo que hace y sabe que cuanto más produce sus utilidades aumentarán. Es por ello que trata de avanzar lo más rápido posible; sobre todo en horas de la tarde, después de desocuparse de sus labores domesticas.  Desde muy niña aprendió esta actividad y hoy es toda una experta en el manejo del crochet. En adelante piensa agruparse entre varios socias y brindar prendas tejidas a los clientes. Es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar responsablemente el pago de sus cuotas, considerando éste crédito muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de hilos para continuar tejiendo, asimismo desea invertir en la educación de su hijo.
texts.en: Sofia is an enterprising mother who enjoys doing things well. She lives in her own home in the company of her husband and their 3 children. For 7 years she worked as a seamstress but now she decorates sweaters with crochet accents, work that she carries out at home to keep an eye on the kids. She feels accomplished in this work and she enjoys doing it. She knows that the more she produces, the greater her earnings. She tries to work as fast as possible, especially in the afternoons when she has completed the house work. She learned the trade when she was just a girl and today she is an expert in the field. In the future she is thinking about getting a group of neighbors together to make crocheted clothing for her clients. The loan she requests will be invested in the purchase of threads to keep crocheting. She also wants to invest in her son's education.

loans.use: To purchase yard for knitting.

loans.name: Yader Javier

texts.es:
El señor Yader Javier S. M., es un joven de 27 años, habita en el barrio Pablo Calero, es agricultor con una experiencia de más de 15 años, su esposa sea dedica a comercializar, las frutas y verduras de las cosechas, fue con el apoyo de su abuelo que inicio trabajando en este sector agrícola, ellos tienen un niño de 3 años, que aun no asisten a la escuela, ellos a lo largo de los años se han enfrentado a problemas de infección de plagas, y es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo para la compra insumos vegetales, fungicidas, y pesticidas, que permitan un mantenimiento Fito Sanitario optimo para sus cosechas, y la buena producción de las mismas, que a futuro le erradiquen las plagas, mejoren las ventas, y favorezcan sus condiciones económicas a beneficio de su pequeños hijo que pronto entrara al preescolar y además desean mejorar la infraestructura de su pequeño y humilde hogar.
Este no es el primer prestamo del señor y Afodenic ha observado las mejoras que el señor SAnchez ha tenido en los ultimos años, y es para nosotros de satisfaccion el poder apoyarle a este hombre que se ha mostrado ocn mucha honradez y responsabilidad con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Yader Javier S. M. is a young man of 27.  He lives in Pablo Calero neighborhood and is a farmer with more than 15 years experience.  His wife sells the fruit and vegetables that he harvests.  He started working in farming with the support of his grandfather.  He and his wife have a 3 year-old child who doesn't yet go to school.  Throughout the years, they have faced problems with insect infestations and this is why he is requesting this loan.  He would like to buy farming supplies, fungicides and pesticides that will allow him to maintain optimum plant health for his harvests and good production.  In the future, insect infestations will be eradicated, his sales will improve and his financial situation will improve, for the benefit of his small son who will soon be entering pre-school.  In addition, Yader Javier would like to improve the infrastructure of his small and modest home.

This is not the first loan that he has taken and Afodenic have observed the improvements that Mr S. has made over the last few years.  We are happy to be able to support this man who has shown a lot of honesty and responsibility in his loan repayments.

loans.use: To maintain plant health

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 45 años, vive en su casa propia en compañía de sus 3 hijos que son menores de edad, y estudian en el colegio; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Desde hace 3 años, esta empeñosa mujer se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza de una reconocida marca, y ofrece durante todos los días en  sus ratos libres, a sus amigas y conocidas que suelen comprarle sus cosméticos con regular frecuencia. Le gusta mucho su trabajo  pues es tranquilo ya que le permite realizar sin problemas sus labores del hogar. Es así que, mientras camina o recoge a sus hijos del colegio va ofreciendo mediante el catalogo los productos; pero afirma que le disgusta cuando sus compradoras se atrasan en el pago puntual de los productos. Así transcurren los días de esta trabajadora mujer, muy dedicada que busca  brindarles una adecuada calidad de vida a sus hijos; y ya tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de instalar un  pequeño bazar, donde pueda ofrecer sus productos y también útiles escolares y juguetes. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que les permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Rosa tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería en productos de belleza, pues tiene varios pedidos pendientes que espera concretar para aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Rosa is 45 years old and she lives in her own home in the company of her three young children. They are all in school. Together they work hard every day to come out ahead. For the past three years, this enterprising woman has been selling beauty products of a well known brand name. And she sells every day during her spare time to her friends and acquaintances. They look to buy from her regularly. She enjoys the work because it is at a comfortable pace, permitting her to do her housework. When she walks to pick up her kids at school she makes her sales on the way, offering products from a catalogue. But she says she doesn't appreciate when the buyers get behind on their payments. This is how this enterprising woman spends her days. She is very devoted and she looks to provide her children with a good quality of life. She has many plans for the future. She wants to install a bazaar from where to sell her products in addition to school supplies and toys. This is the second loan she has requested through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments on time. She doesn't want to cause any trouble for those individuals who are making this possible for her, allowing her to keep progressing in her work. Rosa's plans are to invest the loan requested in the purchase of beauty products. She has several orders that have been placed. Filling these orders will help her increase her earnings.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es: La señora Juana Maria C., tiene la edad de 58 años vive en el Barrio de San Caralampio, ella y su esposo son agricultores, tienen 6 hijos todos mayores de edad, casados e independientes y le apoyan a sus padres, la señora Juana se ha dedicado a estas actividades desde hace 25 años atrás, ella solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos vegetativos, fertilizantes y fungicidas que aporten un mantenimiento Fito Sanitario correcto que beneficie su producción y sus ventas, a favor de reforestar la finca y establecer una nueva variedad e cosechas que tengan un buen consumo, esta inversión les favorecerá la sus recursos económicos para un retiro de trabajo mas optimo.
texts.en: Juana Maria C. is 58 years old and lives in San Caralampio neighborhood.  Both she and her husband are farmers.  They have six grown-up children who are all married, live independently and support their parents.  Juana has been working as a farmer for the past 25 years.  She is requesting a loan to buy farming supplies, fertilizers and fungicides to maintain good plant health that will favor her production and her sales.  This will help to reforest her farm and establish a new variety of harvests that are in demand.  This investment will improve her financial situation so that she can enjoy a better retirement.

loans.use: To maintain plant health

loans.name: Onorina

texts.es: Onorina, de 40 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de sus 3 hijos menores, pues es separada, y todos los días se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante. Desde hace 3 años, esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la venta de comestibles, gaseosas y cervezas en una pequeña tienda que instaló en su casa. Esta muy satisfecha con su labor pues es tranquila y no descuida su hogar, además obtiene regulares ganancias que le permiten ofrecer una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos, y tiene bastantes clientes que le consumen con frecuencia sus bebidas pues la zona por donde vive es algo alejada y hace bastante calor, dice que tiene regulares ganancias sobretodo durante los fines de semana. Así transcurren los días de Onorina, cuida a sus hijos y atiende empeñosa su negocio, y como es muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado mejorar las instalaciones de su tienda y ampliarla, pues desea continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere defraudar a las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Onorina tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de cantidad de cajas de cervezas, que necesita para continuar trabajando, de esta manera espera salir adelante.
texts.en: Onorina is 40 years old and she lives in her own home alongside her 3 young children. She is separated. Every day she works hard to come out ahead. For the past 3 years, this enterprising woman has had a convenience store installed in her home from where she sells food items, soft drinks, and beer. She is very happy with her work because it is at a comfortable pace and she is able to maintain her home at the same time. It is a constant source of income that grants her the ability to give her kids a good quality of life. She has several regular clients who purchase drinks from her, especially because they live in a remote community of very warm climate. She has a steady source of income, especially during the weekends. This is how Onorina spends her days, caring for her kids and managing her store. And because she is very enterprising she has planned to improve and expand the store in the future. She endeavors to keep up the progress. This is a first time loan for her through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments on time, not wanting to defraud those individuals who made this loan possible. This support will help her to keep working and progressing in her business. Onorina will invest the loan in the purchase of a number of boxes of beer that she needs for her business. This is how she plans to come out ahead.

loans.use: To purchase a supply of beer.

loans.name: Juna

texts.en:
Juna P. is from the village of Maquilao in Tangub City. She is 40 years old. Juna is married and has 3 adult children. To make a living, Juna raises and sells fish. Juna has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 1500 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010, Juna joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Juna has successfully repaid a previous loan of 3000 PHP from GDMPC. Juna is requesting a new loan of 6000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Juna from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living conditions.

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To expand her business

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn T. is from the village of Maquilao in Tangub City. She is 43 years old. Jocelyn is married and has 5 adult children. To make a living Jocelyn owns and operate a business in food sector .While not the only means of generating revenue she raises and sells fish to the local community. Jocelyn has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 1500 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010, Jocelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Jocelyn has successfully repaid a previous loan of 3000 PHP from GDMPC. Jocelyn is requesting a new loan of 6000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Jocelyn from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living conditions.

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To expand her business

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: El señor Juan Jose V. B., tiene la edad, 37 años, habita en el Barrio Medardo Andino, es soltero pero tiene 4 hijos menores de edad que actualmente se dedican a los estudios, ellos son agricultores con una experiencia en el campo de más de 15 años, tiempo en el que se han enfrentado a problemas de plagas, y enfermedades de sus terrenos, es por esta razón que solicitan un préstamo para la compra de fungicidas, fertilizantes y pesticidas que permitan un mantenimiento Ftio Sanitario, que erradiquen el problema de las plagas, que a futuro favorezcan las ventas y la economía a beneficio de sus hijos que pronto ingresaran a la universidad y espera mejorar sus recursos para solventar ese gasto económico en pro del buen desarrollo económico social de los suyos.
texts.en: Juan Jose V. B. is 37 years old.  He lives in Medardo Andino neighborhood.  He is single but has four dependent children who are currently studying.  He is a farmer with more than 15 years of experience.  Over the years, he has faced problems with insect infestations and diseases on his land.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy fungicides, fertilizers and pesticides that will enable him to maintain the health of his plants and eradicate problems with insect infestations.  In the future, this will favor his sales and his financial situation for the benefit of his children who will soon be going to university.  He hopes to improve his financial situation so that he can cover this financial expense and provide for the financial and social development of his children.

loans.use: To maintain plant health

loans.name: Lucina

texts.en:
Lucina A. is from the village of Maquilao in Tangub City. She is 43 years old. Lucina is married and has 3 school-aged children. To make a living, Lucina raises and sells fish. Lucina has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 1500 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010, Lucina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lucina has successfully repaid a previous loan of 3000 PHP from GDMPC. Lucina is requesting a new loan of 4000 PHP which will be used to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Lucina from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living conditions.

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Abraham

texts.en:
Abraham B. is from the village of Poblacion 1 in Oroquieta City. He is 35 years old. Abraham is married and has a baby. To make a living, Abraham runs a barber shop in his local community. Abraham has been engaged in his business for over 10 years and earns approximately 12000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Abraham joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Abraham has successfully repaid a previous loan of 20000 PHP from GDMPC. Abraham is requesting a new loan of 19500 PHP which will be used to purchase supplies that he needs to expand the services that he provides. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Abraham from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve his family's living conditions.

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase supplies for his barber shop

loans.name: Araceli

texts.es: La señora Araceli L. Hernández es originaria de la localidad llamada San José Purua ubicado en el estado de Michoacán, un lugar hermoso donde sus aguas son conocidas como termales o aguas de azufre. Doña Araceli tiene 38 años de edad, estudio hasta el sexto año de primaria por que sus padres no tenían el dinero suficiente para apoyarla con los gastos de la escuela, también dice que en su localidad en ese entonces no había secundaria y que tenían que trasladarse a otra comunidad para estudiarla. Doña Chely como es conocida por sus amistades esta pidiendo un crédito para invertir en la cenaduría (restaurante para cenar) que tiene ella vende ahí pozole, tacos, enchiladas, tostadas etc. comenta que la abre los días viernes, sábado y domingo y entre semana se dedica a la venta de verduras en un local que tiene en el centro de localidad. Ella esta casada con el señor Isidro el cual es carnicero, ellos tienen 3 hijos la mayor ya casada, después le siguen Miguel, de 12 años de edad que estudia la primaria y Jesús Guadalupe de un año de edad. La meta que tiene para su negocio es invertir en abarrotes, comenta que poco a poco a estado comprando anaqueles para empezar a surtir los abarrotes. También comenta que su esposo es una persona muy trabajadora ya que los días domingos vende barbacoa. Ella y su esposo están trabajando muy duro porque están construyendo su casa, dice que esta ahorrando para comprar las ventanas y puertas por que ya le gustaría vivir en ella ya que es de cemento porque donde vive es prestado por su papá y es una casa de madera donde en época de invierno se mete el frió.
texts.en: Araceli L. Hernandez is originally from the region known as San Jose Purua. It is located in the state of Michoacan, a beautiful region known for its thermal water springs. Araceli is 38 years old and she has a grade six education. Her parents did not have sufficient funds to keep her in school. Her community did not have a high school at the time and they would have had to move to another community to attend. Chely, as she is known to her friends, requests a loan to invest in her restaurant (restaurant where dinners are served). There she sells pozole, tacos, enchiladas, tostadas etc. She opens the restaurant on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays. During the week she sells vegetables from a stand she has in the downtown area.  She is married to Isidro, a butcher, and they have 3 children together. The eldest girl is married. The second youngest is 12 years old and she is in primary school and Jesus Guadalupe is 1 year old.  She wishes to invest in her business with the purchase of grocery items. Slowly she has been purchasing more items to be well stocked. Her husband is a very hard working person who, on Sundays, sells barbecued meats. She and her husband work hard because they are having a house built for them. She says that they are saving to purchase windows and doors. She would like to live there already because it is made of cement. Where they live now is on loan from her father and it is a house made of wood and in the winter it is very cold.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients to prepare foods.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es: La señora Gabriela M. Mújica tiene 28 años de edad y es originaria de la localidad San José Purua ubicado en el estado de Michoacán, un lugar hermoso donde sus aguas son conocidas como termales o aguas de azufre. La señora Gaby como es conocida por sus amigas y vecinos estudio como técnico en enfermería, aunque dice que no termino su carrera porque se caso muy joven y su esposo ya no la dejo seguir estudiando ya que también tenían a su primer hijo y se le dificultaba pagar los gastos de su escuela y los gastos de su niño. Gaby como le gusta que le digan, vende productos de belleza y para el hogar por catalogo, ella tiene con esta actividad mas de 4 años comenta que ella empezó a trabajar para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, ella sale a vender a diferentes escuelas a las maestras y a sus vecinas, comenta que ella tiene esta actividad gracias a su suegra porque ella fue quien la invito a trabajar en la venta de productos por catalogo. La señora Gaby esta pidiendo un crédito a la Fundación para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de productos de belleza y para el hogar, Ella esta casada con el señor Ernesto el cual es jornalero, ellos tienen 2 niños de nombres Alejandro de 9 años el cual estudia la primaria y Alonso de 5 años de edad que estudia el jardín de niños. La meta que tiene para su negocio la señora Gaby es hacer un local en su casa ya que tiene espacio y hacer una papelería y venta de regalos ya que cerca de su casa no hay ese tipo de negocio comenta que esta pensando en realizar ese sueño.
texts.en: Gabriela M. Mujica is 28 years old and she is originally from the region of San Jose Purua in the state of Michoacan. It is a beautiful region known for its hot thermal springs. Gaby, as she is known to her friends and neighbors, studied to be a nursing assistant, but she didn't complete her training because she married very young and her husband did not let her keep going. They had already had their first child and it was too difficult to cover the tuition and pay for the baby's expenses. Gaby, as she likes to be called, sells beauty products and household items through a catalogue. She has been in the business for four years and she started out to help her husband with the household expenses. She goes out to sell to the teachers in various schools and to her neighbors. She has this business thanks to her mother-in-law because she was the one who encouraged her to work in the sale of products through catalogues. Gaby requests a loan from Fundacion (Kiva Field Partner) in order to invest in the purchase of beauty products and household products. She is married to Ernesto, a day laborer. They have two children, Alejandro who is 9 years old and in primary school, and Alonso who is 5 years old and in kindergarten. Gaby's goal is to set up a store from her house because there is room to accommodate it. She wants to set up an office supply store and toy store.  There are no other businesses like this one near her home and this would be the realization of a dream.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La señora  Rosa María López Madriz, cuenta con 40 años de edad, casada desde hace 24 años con el señor Francisco que se dedica a la albañilería, ellos tienen 5 hijos, Erika de 22 años, Cristian de 20 años, Pablo que tiene 16 años quien le ayuda con los gastos de la casa, Dulce María de 8 años de edad y Francisco de 6 años ambos estudiantes de primaria, ella es originaria de la localidad de San Jose Purua ubicado en el estado de Michoacán. Doña Rosa pidió su préstamo para invertir en su taller de costura como son hilos, telas, estambres, pinturas para tela, pinceles, sierres etc. Ella hace bolsas, bordados en servilletas, punto de cruz en servilletas y almohadones, blusas de manta, después las decora con dibujos y las colorea. Doña Rosa vende las costuras con sus conocidas, lleva con su negocio hace 5 meses, comenta que le satisface su trabajo, sus clientas dicen que es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de salir adelante, sus metas en la vida es sacar a sus hijos adelante que sigan estudiando, y comenta que en un futuro quisiera tener un negocio fijo y con sus ganancias podrá comprarle a sus hijos útiles escolares y los uniformes para el nuevo ciclo escolar y los medicamentos de su suegra.
texts.en: Rosa Maria L. Madriz is 40 years old, and she has been married with Francisco, a construction worker, for 24 years. they have 5 children, Erika who is 22 years old, Cristian is 20 years old, Pablo is 16 years old and he contributes to the household finances, Dulce Maria is 8 years old, and Francisco is 6 years old. The two youngest are in primary school. She is originally from San Jose Purua which is located in the state of Michoacan. Rosa requested this loan to invest in her tailoring shop by purchasing threads, fabrics, yarns, fabric paints, paint brushes, zippers etc. She makes purses, decorated handkerchiefs, decorative pillows, and linen blouses. She decorates and colors the items prior to resale. Rosa sells her products to her acquaintances, a business she has had for the past 5 months. She is very happy with the business. Her clients say that she is a very hardworking and enterprising person with a great will to come out ahead. Her goal in life is to keep her kids in school. In the future she would like to have a steady business from where she will be able to provide her kids with the school supplies and uniforms they need. She also wants to buy medicine for her mother-in-law.

loans.use: To purchase threads and fabrics.

loans.name: Una Luz Al Desarrollo Group

texts.es:
La Alcancía Comunal  "Una Luz Al Desarrollo" consiste en 9 vecinos y amigos que quieren mejorar sus vidas económicamente.  El grupo lleva tres años juntos y la presidenta es Eloyda.
Eloyda tiene 29 años de edad y es madre de dos hijos- de 12 y 3 años de edad.  Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa por pedidos en su barrio.  En esta temporada navideña, tiene muchos pedidos de ropa y zapatillas para niños.  Con el préstamo solicitado a EDAPROSPO, comprara más  mercadería para vender a sus clientes.  En el futuro, Eloyda sueña con tener su propio puesto en un mercado donde podría vender ropa.
texts.en:
The community bank named "Una Luz al Desarrollo" is made up of 9 neighbors and friends with the common goal of improving their finances. The group has been together for three years and their leader is Eloyda. 

Eloyda is 29 years old and she is the mother of two, aged 12 and 3 years old. she sells clothing by taking orders in her neighborhood.  During this Christmas season she has many orders for children's clothing and shoes. The loan she has requested from Edaprospo (Kiva Field Partner) will be used to purchase merchandise to offer her clients. In the future Eloyda dreams of having a stand in the market from where to sell her clothing.

loans.use: To purchase clothing and shoes for the Christmas season.

texts.en: Nhim P. now weaves bamboo baskets for sale in order to support her family’s expenses. She sells her finished products to buyers who come directly to her house. She makes over 50 sets of baskets before selling out. She also orders baskets from the other villagers and sells them to make extra profit. She has five children, all of whom are single, and still living under her roof. Her husband has been earning a living for many years by climbing the palm trees behind his house. Palm-tree-climbing jobs are very common for poor people who live in the commune. Recently, some materials for using in his business were broken during use, and Nhim P.’s husband could not perform his job easily. So, Nhim P. is asking for some funds for her husband to buy a ladder, a frying pan, and some containers for palm juice.

loans.use: To buy a ladder, frying pan, and some containers for palm juice.

loans.name: Hernan

texts.en:
Hernan is fifty four years old. He lives in the district of Tambogrande in northern Peru. Tambogrande is a semi-tropical zone, just a few hours away from the coastal desert in the province of Piura. It is primarily populated by small farmers and ranchers. Many residents own small fruit plantations or raise animals. Hernan owns his home. He shares it with is wife and one of their children, who still lives at home.

Hernan owns a hectare of land in the region, on which he has lime trees. He harvests approximately four baskets of limes weekly from his farm, which he sells in local markets, to wholesalers or to local factories. He can regularly be found trimming his trees, to improve their productivity, or harvesting limes.  

In addition to the lime orchard, Hernan and his wife raise sheep in corrals behind their home. They raise the animals for their meat and sell them (once they reach the appropriate size) at local markets. The animal meat serves an important role in the nutrition of the local population and in the cultural traditions of Peru.

This loan will be used to hire a number of field laborers who will complete a general cleaning and overhaul of the lime orchard fields and ditches. Hernan expects the investment will improve production and reduce the risk of diseases and pests.

loans.use: To hire a number of field laborers to complete a general cleaning and overhaul of the lime orchard fields and ditches.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.en: Juan is 53 years old. He lives in the district of Las Lomas in northern Peru. Las Lomas is a semi-tropical zone just a few hours away from the coastal desert in the province of Piura. It is primarily populated by small farmers and ranchers. Many residents own small fruit plantations or raise animals. Juan owns his home. He shares it with his wife and their four children. Juan owns 2 hectares of land in the region on which he grows crops. He has a portion planted in rice, another portion with mature mango trees and another in maracuya (a local fruit somewhat similar to the pomegranate that grows on a vine). He harvests the fruits regularly, selling them in local markets, to wholesalers or to local factories. In addition to the farming activities, Juan and his wife raise animals in corrals behind their home. They raise the animals for their meat and sell them in local markets once they reach the appropriate size. The animals' meat serves an important role in the nutrition of the local population and in the cultural traditions of Peru. The loan will be used to purchase additional fertilizer and pesticides for his crops. He expects that the investment will improve the health and production of his fields, thus improving the family’s income. He hopes to be able to continue to make improvements to their home and provide his children with opportunities off the farm.

loans.use: Purchase additional fertilizer and pesticides for his crops

Because the pig-raising business is a very profitable one for Si S. and her family, Si S. has requested a loan in order to buy additional feed and piglets to feed for sale during the period when pork is commanding the highest price.
